resources.string: You dont have any uploads. Try uploading files with the upload button below
You dont have any uploads available

File.io is an easy ephemeral file sharing app that lets you upload any file up to 5GB size and share anonymously. The file is immediately deleted after once downloaded 
This app uses the service provided by www.file.io 
By using this app you agree to the terms and conditions mentioned at https://www.file.io/tos.html 

How to use: 
1)Select a file using the button on home screen 
2)Track the progress at the notification 
3)When uploaded, you can share the link to anyone
Note: While sharing, avoid using services with preview(like whatsapp) because it causes the file to be downloaded and no longer accessible).
